item.description:
Vej Naturals July Boston Raw Food Meetup Event

Attend the newest vegan restaurant in the Boston Area.

New Time: Thursday night at 6 PM.

From the Vej Naturals web site:
Bob Bouley is a chef with 25 years of cooking experience. During the last seven years, Bob has spent many hours looking through cookbooks and developing a large number of recipes which will please the palates of vegans and omnivores alike.

Lisa Bouley, a nutritionist with her Master's of Science degree in nutrition, teaches classes on a variety of nutritional topics, focusing on the values and benefits of a plant based diet.

We choose the most wholesome foods so that each dining experience will provide both enjoyment and nutrition. Our goal is that our patrons be happy and healthy.

Menu for Raw Meetup July 19, 2008


Appetizers

Nori Seed Cheese Rolls $6.99
Untoasted Nori wrapped around a delectable combination of Seed Cheese and Seasonal vegetables.

Nachos Crudos $6.99
Veggie “Tortilla” Chips piled with Salsa Fresca, Guacamole, and Pine Nut Sour Cream


Salad

Garden of Life $5.99
Mesclun, Baby Arugula, Buckwheat Greens, Alfalfa Sprouts, Grape Tomato, Cucumber, Carrots, Red Onion topped with choice of Lemon Miso Tahini, Agave-Lime, or Green Goddess.


Entrees $9.99

Vej Nut Loaf
A medley of Seasonal Vegetables and Herbs with Walnuts, Almonds, and Sunflower Seeds. Served on a bed of Summer Greens, Dulse, Sweet Red Pepper and Carrots with a Lemon-Hemp Dressing.

Summer Primavera
Julienne Zucchini, Red Bell Pepper, and Carrots, tossed with basil and grape tomatoes. Served with a Garlic Almond Sauce.

An assortment of raw desserts will be also be available.

The above raw menu may be revised prior to the August event.

The Standard Menu
http://www.vejnatural...

Directions
http://www.vejnatural...
